title: Archaeological area of Piano della Comunità
description: The archaeological area of Piano (or Quarto) di Comunità is an area of Etrusco-Roman Veii where there is evidence for a Republican domus that is modified during the Augustan period. The area is then used as a necropolis in Late Antiquity (fourth and fifth centuries).

properties.title: OSM location of archaeological area of Piano della Comunità
